Nobottle was a town in the Westfarthing: David Salo suggests that the name represents a possible Old English etymology *Neowebotl
Bottle in an element in English place-names meaning "large dwelling". wikipedia:Nobottle is an actual place-name in wikipedia:Northamptonshire
wikipedia:England (erroneously listed as being in wikipedia:Northumberland).
